Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.name: x-ms-client-request-id
Azure.Core.ClientRequestIdHeader.description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.name: If-Match
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.description: The request should only proceed if an entity matches this string.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.name: If-Modified-Since
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifM.description: The request should only proceed if the entity was modified after this time.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifN.name: If-None-Match
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifN.description: The request should only proceed if no entity matches this string.

Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifU.name: If-Unmodified-Since
Azure.Core.ConditionalRequestHeaders.ifU.description: The request should only proceed if the entity was not modified after this time.

Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.name: api-version
Azure.Core.Foundations.ApiVersionParamet.description: The API version to use for this operation.

Azure.Core.MaxPageSizeQueryParameter.description: The maximum number of result items per page.

Azure.Core.RepeatabilityRequestHeaders.r.description: Specifies the date and time at which the request was first created.

Azure.Core.RepeatabilityRequestHeaders.r.name: Repeatability-Request-ID
Azure.Core.RepeatabilityRequestHeaders.r.description: An opaque, globally-unique, client-generated string identifier for the request.
